attributes.title: One Minute Melee Debuts MONDAY, October 6th!
attributes.caption: From the animators of DEATH BATTLE!, this is One Minute Melee! How is this different than DEATH BATTLE!? Simple: there is NO RESEARCH put in to each melee. While they may be just for fun, it doesn't mean One Minute Melee isn't crazy intense. &n
attributes.description: From the animators of DEATH BATTLE!, this is One Minute Melee! How is this different than DEATH BATTLE!? Simple: there is NO RESEARCH put in to each melee. While they may be just for fun, it doesn't mean One Minute Melee isn't crazy intense.
attributes.display_title: S1:E0 - One Minute Melee Debuts MONDAY, October 6th!

attributes.title: **NEW SERIES** One Minute Melee - Jin Saotome Vs Gambit
attributes.caption:
2 Fighters! No Research! 60 Seconds! MELEE!!!!  
Check out this special sneak peak of ScrewAttack's upcoming show One Minute Melee. Debuting Monday, October 6th!
attributes.description: 2 Fighters! No Research! 60 Seconds! MELEE!!!! Check out this special sneak peak of ScrewAttack's upcoming show One Minute Melee. Debuting Monday, October 6th!
